item.title: Partying, bloodbaths and curses on Samhain. This is Halloween…
item.dc:creator: Google Bard and Jonathan
item.description:
Halloween is a holiday believed to have originated from the ancient Celtic festival of Samhain, marking the end of the summer harvest and the beginning of winter. It was also believed to be a time when the veil between the living and the dead was thin. During Samhain, the Celts built bonfires, donned costumes, and […]

The post Partying, bloodbaths and curses on Samhain. This is Halloween… first appeared on The Counselor.

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Lemire
item.description:
This world is becoming increasingly complex to say the least. We could also see those intricacies as potential. On top of helping individuals, my counseling services can also serve your business, group or professionnal practice. Please send me any questions and inquiries regarding those needs and it will be my pleasure to adress them promptly. […]
